entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy late this evening. Wind becoming east 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:54 PM CDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:54 PM CDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 6:54 PM CDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
